thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Carlsberg ‍Q4 revenue below analysts' expectations​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Carlsberg ‍Q4 revenue below analysts' expectations​
text:
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Carlsberg:
* Q4 REVENUE DKK 13,105‍​ MILLION VERSUS DKK 13,629 MILLION SEEN IN REUTERS POLL‍
* 2017 REPORTED NET REVENUE OF DKK 61,808M​ * SAYS ‍PROPOSED DIVIDEND INCREASE OF 60%​ * ‍SOLID +3% PRICE/MIX IMPROVEMENT​ * SAYS FULL-YEAR 2017 ‍SOLID +3% PRICE/MIX IMPROVEMENT​ * SAYS ‍MID-SINGLE-DIGIT PERCENTAGE ORGANIC GROWTH IN OPERATING PROFIT​
* SAYS ‍A TRANSLATION IMPACT ON OPERATING PROFIT OF AROUND DKK -450M, BASED ON SPOT RATES AS AT 6 FEBRUARY​
* SAYS FULL-YEAR 2017 ‍ORGANIC OPERATING PROFIT GROWTH OF 8.4%​
* CEO SAYS ‍FUNDING JOURNEY WILL DELIVER AROUND DKK 2.3BN​ * SAYS FULL-YEAR 2017 ‍OPERATING MARGIN +120BP TO 14.4%; IMPROVEMENT IN ALL THREE REGIONS.​
* CEO SAYS ‍SUPERVISORY BOARD WILL RECOMMEND AN INCREASE IN DIVIDENDS OF 60% TO DKK 16​
* SAYS FULL-YEAR 2017 ‍REPORTED NET PROFIT OF DKK 1,259M​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Copenhagen newsroom)
